page.title: 05The Village shop
page.content: { Mrs Witt}runs the{local post office and shop.The room is quite small but is used to its capacity with shelves up to the roof and items are placed one on top of each other.There is a small booth in the corner of the room with scales and a number of parcels. On the wall nearest the door there is a large pin board with pamphlets and messages on and{this acts as the vill- {age notice board. The every day needs like bacon,cheese and butter are sold the most.{Thursday {and Friday}are really the busiest days because{Thursday is pension day and {Friday is the day before the week-end. A postman collects the parcels at{11 {a.m. and 4.30 p.m. Mrs Witt can't really compete with the big supermarkets. She does{not sell dog and car licences. {(AUTHORS:H.Davies,G.Cubitt)
